targets.query: SELECT (last("Power DC1") + last("Power DC2")) FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval*4) fill(null)
SELECT (last("Power DC1") + last("Power DC2")) FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval*4) fill(null)
SELECT (last("Power DC1") + last("Power DC2")) FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval*4) fill(null)
SELECT (last("Power DC1") + last("Power DC2")) FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval*4) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Current battery charge-discharge power") * -1  FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE "Current battery charge-discharge power" < 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("Current battery charge-discharge power")  FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE "Current battery charge-discharge power" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("Home own consumption from grid") FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") / ((24 * 60 * 60) / count("value")) / 24 / 7 / 1000 * 7.69 FROM "plenticore.0.scb.statistic.EnergyFlow.EnergyToGridDay" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1w) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT mean("Total active power (powermeter)") / -1000 * $kWEuro FROM "modbus.HoldingRegister" WHERE ("Total active power (powermeter)" < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
